text: Hi you might not know me but I’m #CEV. I can’t take the #vaccine and #covid could kill me. I’m only 40! I need supportive #Shielding to #protect me from #COVID19. Please #DontForgetAboutMe. I am still alive #forgottenShielder #StillShielding #ShieldingSavesLives #PleaseHelp #RT https://t.co/WAyzdVHdV4
